value_claims.claim_title: Tüpraş employees save more than an hour daily with Microsoft 365 Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Tüpraş implemented Microsoft 365 Copilot to streamline daily tasks through enhanced collaboration and productivity applications, resulting in employees saving more than an hour daily.
value_claims.source_quote: Tüpraş prioritized Microsoft 365 Copilot for AI-powered insights and automation, streamlining employees' daily tasks through enhanced functions in collaboration and productivity applications. It estimates that employees save more than an hour daily
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time savings are explicitly attributed to Microsoft 365 Copilot's AI-powered insights and automation capabilities that streamline daily tasks.

value_claims.claim_title: Tüpraş achieves IT resource efficiency gains with Microsoft 365 Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: In addition to employee time savings, Tüpraş reported IT resource efficiency gains from implementing Microsoft 365 Copilot.
value_claims.source_quote: It estimates that employees save more than an hour daily while also seeing IT resource efficiency gains.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: IT resource efficiency gains are directly attributed to the implementation of Microsoft 365 Copilot alongside employee productivity improvements.
